name: External Diagnosis Code 2 Version
description: The code used to indicate if the external diagnosis code is ICD-9/ICD-10.

fhirMapping.derived: IF eob.diagnosis[N].diagnosisCodeableConcept.coding[N].system = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-9-cm' THEN diagnosis code is ICD-9.  IF eob.diagnosis[N].diagnosisCodeableConcept.coding[N].system = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm' THEN diagnosis code is ICD-10
